description: This file provides functions for sorting source map segments within a source map. It includes logic for identifying unsorted segments, sorting them, and comparing segments by their column positions.

methods.name: export default function maybeSort( maybeSort
methods.description: Main function to possibly sort segments in the provided source map based on ownership.

methods.name: function nextUnsortedSegmentLine(mappings: SourceMapSegment[][], start: number): number { nextUnsortedSegmentLine
methods.description: Finds the index of the next line with unsorted segments starting from a given index.

methods.name: function isSorted(line: SourceMapSegment[]): boolean { isSorted
methods.description: Checks if a line of source map segments is sorted by column.

methods.name: function sortSegments(line: SourceMapSegment[], owned: boolean): SourceMapSegment[] { sortSegments
methods.description: Sorts a line of source map segments by their column values.

methods.name: export function sortComparator<T extends SourceMapSegment | ReverseSegment>(a: T, b: T): number / sortComparator
methods.description: Comparison function to determine order of segments based on their column positions.

ctags.name: sortComparator
ctags.pattern: /^export function sortComparator<T extends SourceMapSegment | ReverseSegment>(a: T, b: T): number /
